definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: Remeber this scene from Forest Gump?
sentences.chinese: 記得阿甘正傳內的這個場景嗎？

sentences.english: I remember the sentence very clearly from the very famous film Forrest Gump .
sentences.chinese: 我記得一句非常清楚地從非常有名的電影阿甘正傳。

definition: Wolf Totem, novel by Lü Jiamin aka Jiang Rong
La Comédie humaine, series of novels by 19th century French novelist Honoré de Balzac 巴爾扎克|巴尔扎克[Ba1 er3 zha1 ke4]
lit. the lioness from Hedong roars (idiom)/fig. refers to a shrewish wife or a henpecked husband
to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
